companionAccepted_Spouse: Sure! I really enjoy going out with you!$1#$b#Let me get my camera, maybe we can take some cute pictures together on the way.
companionRejectedNight_Spouse: I don't really like going outdoor at night, @.$2#$b#I prefer spending the night with you in our house. *giggles*$4
companionDismiss_Spouse: Okay, I'll get going then!#$b#I snatched some cute candids of you, I better back them up!$1#$b#Love you, and take care, honey!
companionDismissAuto_Spouse: I had fun time going out with you today, babe, but my feet are killing me.$2#$b#I'll go home and get some rest, you should go home soon too.#$b#Stay safe, love you!$1
companionRecruited_Spouse: Ooh, I am so excited!! I even bring spare memory card and battery for my camera!$1
companionAccepted: Alright, but let's avoid the mines. I don't want to get all dirty.
companionRejectedNight: It's too late to do anything now.$3
companionDismiss: ...Aww, I was just starting to enjoy myself too.#$b#Well, I guess I'll see you later!$1
companionDismissAuto: Sorry, @, I'm too tired to continue. I'll see you later.
companionRecruited: Hmm... where to first, @? I want to get some good shots.
companionSuggest: I'm thinking about taking some photos of the valley.#$q -1 -1#You should come too, I could use the help.#$r -1 0 Yes#Yeah, why not? Let me gather my things.#$r -1 0 No#Sorry, I have some other things to do today. Maybe next time?
companionSuggest_Yes: Perfect! Why don't you choose where we start?$1
companionSuggest_No: It's a shame that you're busy. Bye, then.
companion_Beach_summer: We're going to sunbathe today? Good idea, I need a tan!$1
companion_Beach_summer~1: You want to go for a swim, @? It's a good day for it!
companion_Beach_Dating: Do you want to see if there are any shells to collect? I could spend all day at the beach!$1
companion_Bugland: You have got to be kidding!$5#$b#Remind me again why I wanted to come with you today, @?$3
companion_Desert: A friend of my sister lives out here, she has gorgeous hair.#$b#Not better than mine, but really nice!$11
companion_Desert~1: It's so hot!#$b#I love warm weather, but this is ridiculous.$2
companion_Farm: You sure do have a lot of dir... land here.$2#$b#That's why you're always dirty, I guess.
companion_Farm_Dating: I know I've teased you a bit about being outside all the time and doing all this farm work, but I'm honestly impressed.#$b#You're doing what you love, and I'm happy for you, @.
companion_Farm_Spouse: Our porch is dirty again. I should... Oh, you're right, dear. Today we have some walking to do instead.$1
companion_Forest: I think there is plenty of room here to build a mall.#$b#...$7#$b#What?$7
companion_Forest_Dating: If you can get past all the bugs and dirt, it's kind of romantic here, I guess...$4
companion_Forest_Dating~1: I've seen Penny out here with the kids before, sometimes they have day trips and picnics.#$b#I wouldn't mind having a picnic with you one of these days, if you want to?$4#$b#I could even try to cook something for us!$1
companion_Forest_Spouse: I do like living here, @, but my fashion choices really aren't suited for tramping around in the forest.#$b#The views make up for it, I guess.$1
companion_Mine: Can we make this quick? It's pretty dark here, which I'm used to, but everything else...$2
companion_Mine~1: Ew, why are we here?$2#$b#I'm going to get filthy!$3
companion_Mine_Dating: Just... stay close to me down here, okay? I'm not like you, this is definitely not my thing.$2
companion_Mine_Spouse: I am used to the dark, @, but there aren't any slimy monsters in my darkroom!$2
companion_Mountain: This is not a place to come wearing heels...$2
companion_Mountain_Dating: This really is a cute area of the valley.#$b#I don't know Maru or Sebastian very well, but they don't seem to get along.$2#$b#Emily and I are so different, but we're still close.#$b#Family is important.
companion_Mountain_Spouse: I'm glad I brought my camera today, dear! No matter the weather, this area is so nice to look at!
companion_Mountain_Spouse~1: Honey, next time you plan on taking me out this way, remind me to wear different shoes...
companion_Sewer: An okay day has now turned into a terrible one, so thank you for that.$3#$b#I can actually feel myself getting dirtier!$2
companion_Sewer~1: @, are you punishing me for something?$2#$b#Just tell me what I did so I can apologize and we can leave.$2
companion_Town: Let me get a change of clothes since we're here.
companion_Town_Dating: Walking together through our small town with the distant sound of the sea, and all the warm autumn colors swirling around our feet. It's just so romantic...$4
companion_Town_fall: Pelican Town isn't the most exciting place in the world, but nobody can deny how beautiful it looks this time of year!$1
companion_Town_fall~1: I always take too many pictures of fall leaves...
companion_Town_spring: I absolutely love all the flower petals floating through the air in spring.#$b#I never get tired of it.$4
companion_Town_Spouse: Sweetheart, can we stop by my old house for a minute? I just like to see it every now and again.$7
